subject: Re: [junit] HtmlUnit vs jWebUnit
msgSnippet: Hi Srinivas, I am not similiar with HtmlUnit and jWebUnit, but I think HttpUnit is a good choice to test your java writen web application. Leon srinivas
messageBody:
Hi Srinivas,

I am not similiar with HtmlUnit and jWebUnit, but I think HttpUnit is a good choice to test your java writen web application.


Leon

srinivas muthyala <j2eespecialist@...> wrote:

Hi All,
I am currently in the process of choosing a
testing framework for testing our web application. I
am inclined to use either HtmlUnit or jWebUnit, but
not sure if one is better than the other.

Appreciate if any of you can share your
experience/thoughts.


Thank you
Srini
